dmca.title: UK travel site Expresses concern over infringement
dmca.body:
To whom it may concern,

In accordance with the stated copyright policies of Google as posted at http://www.google.com/dmca.html, I am contacting you to make a formal complaint against two websites listed in your Search index.

I have been made aware that two websites included in the Google Search index, apparently administered by the same individual, have copied several hundred
